about_the_game:
INTRODUCTION:


In MOTK: FB, you are a mercenary who finds himself, for some still unknown reason, having to face hundreds of thousands of enemies he has never faced before.

To survive, you must recruit new mercenaries, feed, equip, and train them.
To do this, you need to collect coins and find out what fate offers you in various loot and dead enemies.

There are TWO modes:
- QUICK BATTLE: play a quick game without too many worries.
The most powerful weapons in the game are not included in this mode, and there is only one match type.
- ADVENTURE: face the enemy hordes day after day to collect their loot and increasingly improve your band of mercenaries.
All weapons are unlocked, there are multiple mission types, you have to manage your base and craft all items, but deaths are permanent.
To return safely home with the loot in battle, you will have to call a portal and extract it together with your men.

CHARACTERISTICS:


- Customize the aesthetics and function of your mercenaries: model armored infantrymen, wizards, heavy knights, horse archers, crossbowmen, musketeers, ninjas, and thousands of other variations.

- 6 races: Humans, Orcs, Light Elves, Dark Elves, Dwarves, Goblins.

- 12 magical knowledge: Fire, Water, Earth, Ice, Electricity, Poison, Light, Darkness, Cosmos, Vampire, Demon, Hellfire!

- 210+ weapons, 650+ armor components, a large variety of magic items, and 4 types of mounts (horse, boar, wolf, elk)!!!

- Hire potentially hundreds of mercenaries in your group.

- You can create formations to deploy in battle.

- More than 140 different enemies!!!

FACE THE HORDE, GRAB THE LOOT, CROSS THE PORTAL.
